TEXT: A lich princess of the rising sun awakens in strange lands once more. NL She is a master manipulator of the Tao and her deck.
Your sword and soul shine as one...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~undying~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
